message: Hello Bob, I have a great product for you. Would you like to make an offer for it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do $125, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you at $122. Can you consider that?
I can do $128, but I'm not sure how much lower I can go. This is my final offer.
I'm really close to walking away, but I'll make one last attempt. Can you do $130?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $130, so I'm afraid the answer is no.
